name: Dream-shrines
description: Sacred sites where the boundary between waking and dreaming is thin provide access to prophetic dreams and spiritual insight. The dream magic provides opportunities for divination and spiritual insight, while the dream magic can be both enlightening and dangerous.
atmosphere: The air hums with the soft lullaby of distant dreams. Sweet lavender and moonflower scents drift through the air. Reality itself seems to blur and shift like morning mist. Dream-catchers and sleep-inducing herbs hang from every surface. Your eyelids feel heavy, consciousness slipping between worlds. A gentle floating sensation, as if gravity has lost its grip.
